scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:client && npm run build:react
scripts.dev: npm run build:core && npm run dev:client
scripts.dev:react: npm run build:core && npm run dev -w @speechos/react
scripts.dev:iife: npm run build:core && npm run dev:iife -w @speechos/client
scripts.test:dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev -w @speechos/core" "npm run dev:iife -w @speechos/client" "vite --config test/vite.config.ts"
scripts.test:dev:http: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev -w @speechos/core" "npm run dev:iife -w @speechos/client" "VITE_HTTP=true vite --config test/vite.config.ts"
